techmeme.title: A US judge schedules the US government's remedies trial in the Google antitrust case regarding its advertising tech to begin on September 22 (Hayden Field/CNBC)
Filing: Amazon restructured part of its $8B Anthropic investment from convertible notes into stock in Q1, creating a $3.3B pre-tax gain that boosted its profits (Todd Bishop/GeekWire)
Livestream marketplace Whatnot says it hit $3B+ worth of goods sold through its app last year and viewers spend 80+ minutes per day on average on the app (Ann Gehan/The Information)
An investigation finds 70+ content-farm YouTube channels using AI to produce cartoon content featuring gore and child abuse, featuring characters like minions (Laura Holliday/Wired)
The UK FCA plans to ban retail investors from borrowing money to buy cryptocurrencies, as it aims to bring much of the crypto market under its regulatory remit (Martin Arnold/Financial Times)
